markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Frostwalker Pattern](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2208)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 120 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** tattooed on the body

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Northern peoples design magical tattoos to protect against wintry weather, typically in geometric patterns with a combination of straight lines and whorls. This tattoo negates any damage you take from [severe environmental cold](/Rules.aspx?ID=642) and reduces damage you take from extreme cold to equal that of severe cold.

<document level="2" id="action-1705" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Frostwalker Pattern
